reviewText: I normally like Mel Gibson movies, but this one was predictable and boring from start to finish.  Felt like a waste of time watching.
I enjoyed the film. Good suspense and a fine performance yet again from Mel Gibson!

As described, good price and quick shipping but.... be aware this "Director's Cut" has alternative scenes and a totally
different ending than the one I've seen previously. Not necessarily bad but totally different!
This was an outstanding movie about a father's love for his daughter and his perseverance to find those responsible for her death.
Great adaptation of the British series.  Mel is pretty intense and Ray Winstone is great.
Awesome thriller, great acting by Mel Gibson and the other characters. I have watched this movie several times, great addition to anybody's library who loves action thrillers.
